mapper.select: select o.no, o.member_no as memberNo, o.order_code as orderCode, o.order_date as orderDate, o.address, o.is_member as isMember, o.password, o.payment, o.price, o.buyer_name as buyerName, o.email, o.status, o.buyer_tel as buyerTel, d.status as deliveryStatus from "order" o, delivery d where o.no=d.no order by order_date
